<NEW - WHEELIE>

OOC - Given I posted twice, assumi=

<IN CHARACTER>

At this point, WHEELIE's=
 agitation rose interanlly, but he stayed immediately quiet.  At this point=

ould be no getting out of it and no disagreeing over upon it.

At thi spoin=
t, resting his hands over down on his lap he merely nodded and looked up at=

rs were given.  Merely sighing, "So, what else do we know?  And what can we=

own the hole.  Some backup would be nice, in case we encounter something gu=
nniing for us turbo-mice.  What are we to do, when we encounter something u=
nfriendly unlike you?"

If this was a sweeping patrol in attempt to locate =
the missing RODIMUS, the trio of them would not exactly be in much of a pos=
ition over to do anything if they found him, given something which could da=
mage or corrupt RODIMUS would be way outside of thier combat abilities, eve=

So, LEO PRIME and =
